name: Christoph Schneider
description: '''Christoph Schneider''' ({{IPA|de|ˈkʁɪstɔf ˈʃnaɪdɐ}}; born 11 May 1966) is a German drummer and one of the founding members of the [[Neue Deutsche Härte]] band [[Rammstein]]. He has released eight studio albums and three live albums with the band. He was previously a member of punk bands Die Firma and [[Feeling B]].
